process.title: Reach Out
process.detail: DM me on Discord with your idea and references.

process.title: Discussion
process.detail: We talk details — scope, style, timeline, and price.

process.title: Mock Up
process.detail: You update me on the designs to reach a final version..

process.title: Final Design
process.detail: Once everything has been confirmed and reviewed, i work on making the final version.

terms: Prices may vary based on complexity — the listed prices are starting points.
